column1: '''George Hosato Takei Altman''' ([[20 April]] [[1937]]) is an American actor
column2: best known as [http://memory-alpha.org/en/wiki/Hikaru_Sulu Mr. Sulu] of ''Star Trek'' fame. He was friends{{fact}} with his co-star
column4: until Nimoy passed away on 27 February 2015.

column2: conductor David Warble asked Takei to provide the narration for [[Johan de Meij]]'s ''[[Symphony No. 1
column3: "The Lord of the Rings"]]''. Out of curiosity and admiration of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''
column4: Takei agreed. The show premiered in the Fall of 1991 in the [[wikipedia:Orange County Performing Arts Center|Orange County Performing Arts Center]]
column5: and has since been performed on many places in the world.
